message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go down to $120 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand that $110 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $125. It's a fair price, considering the value the product brings, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $125. I'm willing to meet you at $115. That's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand that $115 is still a bit below my target, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $125, but I'll throw in a special bonus package worth $10. This way, you'll get the product and the bonus at a total price of $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate the bonus package, but I'm still not comfortable with $125. I'm willing to meet you at $120. I'm not willing to go any higher, so I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
